meanings.definition: A musical instrument with a flat-backed sound box and six strings, played by plucking or strumming.
meanings.sent1: She practiced playing guitars every evening after school.
meanings.sent2: The band had guitars, drums, and a keyboard for their performance.
meanings.sent3: The guitars in the music store seemed to whisper melodies to each other.
meanings.sent4: His fingers danced on the guitars like skilled acrobats on a tightrope.
meanings.sent5: The guitars in the concert hall gleamed under the spotlight, captivating the audience.

meanings.definition: A person who plays the guitar.
meanings.sent1: The guitars in the band were all talented musicians.
meanings.sent2: She became a guitars after years of dedicated practice.
meanings.sent3: The guitars at the party strummed along to the cheerful tunes.
meanings.sent4: He was known as the guitars who could make any crowd dance.
meanings.sent5: The guitars' passion for music shone through every performance.
